name: Box Hunter (sjasionowska, Terrykk)
description:
Short puzzle game with experimental labyrinth mechanics. 

The main character is the warehouseman who's task is to get the last BOX from his workplace. 

Open all doors and make your way to the BOX hidden deep inside the labyrinth!

Controls

A - ROTATE LEFT

D - ROTATE RIGHT

SPACE - USE

Authors

This game was created during Ludum Dare 48 by:

Sandra Jasionowska (Gameplay, Graphics) -- https://twitter.com/missphysics93

Krystian Kuryło (User Interface, Music) -- https://twitter.com/notsuperhero2

Tools
  • Unity 3D
  • Aseprite
  • FL Studio
